          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Varför naturkunskap?</string>
            <string language="en">Why nature knowledge?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum Naturwissen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi la connaissance de nature ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por que conhecimento da natureza?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè conoscenza della natura?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί γνώση φύσης;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Por qué conocimiento de la naturaleza?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Samhället skall kunna fungera utan att äventyra nästa generations behov.Modul 1 - Varför naturkunskap?Naturkunskap A - Åsö.</string>
            <string language="en">The society will can to function without jeopardizing next generation's needs.

Module 1 - why nature knowledge?

Naturkunskap A - Åsö.</string>
          </description>

          <structure>

            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Gesellschaft macht ein, um zu arbeiten, ohne 
needs.Module 1 zu gefährden des folgenden Erzeugung - warum Natur 
knowledge?Naturkunskap A - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La société mettra en boîte de fonctionner sans 
compromettre le needs.Module 1 de prochaine génération - pourquoi le
knowledge?Naturkunskap A - Åsö de nature.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A sociedade enlatará para funcionar sem jeopardizing 
needs.Module 1 de geração seguinte - porque o knowledge?Naturkunskap
A da natureza - Åsö.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La società inscatolerà per funzionare senza 
compromettere needs.Module 1 della generazione seguente - perchè 
knowledge?Naturkunskap A - Åsö della natura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κοινωνία μπορεί να λειτουργήσει χωρίς διακινδύνευση
της ενότητας 1 αναγκών της επόμενης γενεάς - γιατί φύση 
knowledge?Naturkunskap Α - Εsφ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La sociedad podrá para funcionar sin el compromiso de 
needs.Module 1 de la generación siguiente - porqué el 
knowledge?Naturkunskap A - Åsö de la naturaleza.</string>
          </description>
